message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can we meet in the middle at $110?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I think the product is worth more than $110. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $115. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I think the product is still worth more than $105. How about we meet in the middle at $112.50?
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with $112.50. I'm willing to meet you at $108, but that's my final offer. Can you consider that?
I understand your final offer, Bob, but I'm still not convinced that's the best price for the product. How about we meet in the middle at $110.50?
I'm not going to go any higher than $108. I'm starting to think that buying from John might be the better option. Can you meet me at $108 or I'll have to walk away?
I understand you're close to walking away, Bob, but I'm still not ready to give up. How about we meet in the middle at $109?

I'm really not willing to go any higher than $108. I think we've negotiated enough. If you're not willing to meet me at $108, I'll have to buy the product from John for $150. It's time to make a decision.
